thread.title: Melania Trump introduces hubby Donald in most bizarre way possible – and people LOVED it
thread.title_full: Melania Trump introduces hubby Donald in most bizarre way possible – and people LOVED it

title: Melania Trump introduces hubby Donald in most bizarre way possible – and people LOVED it
text:
— Jon Burrows (@JonJBurrows) February 18, 2017 
Brian Fraser tweeted: “Does it get anymore Classy than @FLOTUS saying the #LordsPrayer?” 
Twitter user @hale4jesus wrote: “My @Flotus said the "Our Father today in Melbourne,Fl. Never has another flotus made me so proud. #AmericaFirst #AmericansForTrump” 
Jon Burrows wrote on Twitter: “The greatest #FirstLady in history!” Melania Trump: Former model and First Lady-elect Wednesday, 18th January 2017 Former model Melania Trump is married to American businessman and designated 45th President of the United States, Donald Trump. 1 / 19 
Melania, who moved to the US more than 20 years ago, in 1996, spoke with a very strong Eastern European accent. 
This had viewers rushing to Google to find out more about her. 
Searches for Melania’s age, nationality, religion, native language – and whether she is a US citizen – began trending on Google. 
AFP MODEL BEHAVIOUR: Melania leads her husband Donald from Air Force One Is Melania Trump the HOTTEST first lady ever? Monday, 6th February 2017 There have been stylish first ladies throughout the history of the US, there have even been first ladies who were ex-models, but is Melania Trump (née Knauss) the hottest? 1 / 15 WireImage Donald Trump and Melania Trump attend Radio City Music Hall Restoration Grand Opening on 4th October, 1999. 
The brunette – who is mum to 70-year-old Trump’s son Barron – was clearly nervous, but people clearly appreciated her efforts. 
Melania said: “I will always stay true to myself and be truthful to you, no matter what the opposition is saying about me.” Related articles
